title: PCT Patient Care Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Great,  manager was very nice and easy going. All of questions was not hard to answer.  She described exactly what i would be doing and a breakdown of orientation. Also, go went over all paperwork.
Interview Questions: Why would you want to work there

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Walk in Wednesdays was very easy process. Brought my resume, met with nursing managers to discuss open positions and find a best fit for my skill set. I highly recommend.
Interview Questions: Discussed different open positions in the hospital and units to find a best fit.

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital (Schenectady, NY) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process took 2 weeks total. It was a very easy interview and I felt very comfortable. Always call them a few days after, if you are still interested in working. They love that.
Interview Questions: Why did you quit your other job?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital
Interview Descriptions: You will fill out an application to bring with you. HR says to give it to your interviewer but when I handed it to them they didn't know what to do with it. HR will escort you to the department, the interview was no more than 10 minutes, including a brief tour. They described the position and asked me only one or two questions.
Interview Questions: How do you work with others, because there are some strong personalities?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital (Albany, NY) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: Telephone screening was an interview panel with standardized questions, very polite, great conversation, very professional, utilized standard interview behavior based questions using the STAR-Situation, Task, Action, Results format; Questions during interview process focused on customer service, team building, and patient experience along with nursing process and utilizing current standards of nursing practice

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and received an email 3 weeks later asking to call set something up.  The recruiter never answered her phone or returned calls.  I received emails promising she would be in contact but she never followed through.  I wrote this place off.

title: Program Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital (Albany, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Fast and easy interview process. It was easy schedule interview. Questions were causal sort of like getting to know you. Interesting they asked the salary expectation right away. Overall experience was good. Never heard back with tried to follow up with the interview panel
Interview Questions: Salary offered for a position are shocking low for the position/skill

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by my department Supervisor, he mostly asked questions about licensure and pertinent job experience, interview was easy.
Interview Questions: There really were no difficult questions

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital (Schnecksville, PA) in Aug 2009
Interview Descriptions: Interview was very simple.  Asked very few questions.  Mainly interested in ability to use a computer.
Interview Questions: How proficient are you at using Microsoft Office?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Ellis Hospital (Schenectady, NY) in Jul 2009
Interview Descriptions: Interveiw was comparable to other company interviews.  It did take a long time.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Ellis Hospital?
